Log In Search for: Meet Bayou City Outdoors... Our Members... With over 700 active members, we are a diverse, friendly, fun, and adventurous group of people. We are open to both couples and singles that are interested in making a fundamental change in their life for the better. This is not a dating club. All of our events are group-oriented, providing a safe as well as a fun way of participating in many activities and meeting lots of new people . There is a broad range of backgrounds, interests, experiences, and abilities. We have members from all over the world! There is always a friendly, fun crowd and always new and interesting people to meet! Some of our stats : Our members range from 18 to 80 years of age, but the majority of our members are in their 30's, 40's, or 50's.  Club members are about 55% female, 45% male.  About 55% are single, and about 45% are couples.  Many of our members have children, or pets they consider children. Check out Public Photos to see photos from our events Meet our Event Leaders Our Activities... Bayou City Outdoors is a crazy active and social outdoor club, planning and hosting multiple events each week . We are continually adding new events and keeping members informed of club activities via the site, our newsletter and our private Facebook group. Whether you want to explore the nightlife or the area's best hiking trails, you'll find activities on our calendar to suit your tastes. Our events reflect a wide range of interests , giving members the opportunity to share adventures with positive, lively people like themselves in a safe, structured environment. Additionally, many of these events are planned with the beginner in mind, so you'll have many opportunities to try a broad range of new activities. All events are either free, subject to group discounts or are at cost. You can find us on Facebook , too! Want more...? Get to know Bayou City Outdoors! ∼∼∼∼∼∼ Check out our Event Calendar to see what is open for Non-Members Click Here for what's new in Houston! Something for Everyone... Art Galleries, Backpacking, Tennis, Walking, Camping, Scuba diving, Cycling, Social Events, Charity Events, Dining Out, Spelunking, Swimming, Geocache, Kayaking, Happy Hours, Bowling, Live Music, Climbing, Mountain Biking, Trail Running, Museums, Movies, Fishing, Dancing, Farmer's Markets, Hiking, Running, Travel, Boating, Dog-Friendly, Skiing, Sailing, MS-150 Ride, Theatre, Parties, Golf, Yoga ...and many more! Check out our Calendar here! Houston Events and meet new friends Bayou City Outdoors We do the work – you simply show up! Houston's event, adventure, and social club Click Here to Join Us! You not only have access to fun activities and the chance to be a part of a great group of people but also... 100's of Member Only Exclusive events - free or with a discount on special outings Full access to our online calendar Ready-made buddy list! Great for all singles, couples, and parents - all people you'll want to get outdoors and have fun with! Member profiles Need gear? Members have access to our free, gear loaner program! Need a kayak? We'll set you up. How about a bike? Want to go camping for the weekend? FREE Demos throughout the year on selected gear from our sponsors Want to Travel? We travel the country and the globe.  Plus, with BCO you'll always have a travel buddy to share in your adventures Full reciprocity to our sister clubs in other cities in the American Outdoor Adventure Network Meet people that share your active interests Buddy Program for new members so you never feel uncomfortable coming alone... ( What's the Buddy Program? ) We’re so sure you’ll love being a part of our membership that we offer a full, 30-day money-back guarantee. Our job is to bring more fun to your life!  Our members are busy professionals. Long commutes, business and school deadlines, personal errands…when do you find the time to plan your play? Make today the day you get out from behind your desk, get moving, get active, meet new friends, and have loads of fun! Don’t wait, you’ll be missing out on something special. There are events going on every day. Sign up, show up and start having fun, today.  You’ll meet people who live right here, in your city.  Active and interesting people who value their time and enjoy being a part of something special. Ready to get started? Click here and Join us! © 2025 - Bayou City Outdoors - Terms, Conditions and Liability Waiver - Contact us Report There was a problem reporting this post. You will no longer be able to: See blocked member's posts Mention this member in posts Invite this member to groups Message this member Add this member as a connection Please note: This action will also remove this member from your connections and send a report to the site admin.							
							Please allow a few minutes for this process to complete. Confirm Report You have already reported this .

Let's Chat! × WE’RE SO HAPPY YOU’RE HERE. At the Bay Club, we strive to craft experiences that create a robust and active lifestyle for our members – with a focus on sports, fitness, hospitality, and family. A key piece of our success is listening to the needs of our members and using their input to influence our programming and amenities. And, we have found it is just as important to listen early – before the membership has even started. So, please tell us a little about what brought you here today and what you would like your Bay Club experience to look like. We thank you for taking the time to share a little bit about yourself and look forward to assisting you. What brought you here and why would you like to become a part of the Bay Club? Tell us about who the membership is for and how you envision it fitting into your life. What location are you interested in? Our Team | Bayou City Energy Skip to content About Our Team Our Approach Portfolio News Investor Login Main Menu Our Team BCE’s team of professionals have several decades of combined natural resources investing experience and a track record of building successful upstream businesses throughout commodity price cycles. Leadership We have assembled a team with highly relevant experience from varied perspectives in the natural resources investing, corporate finance, and legal disciplines, enabling a comprehensive understanding of investment risks and opportunities. William McMullen Founder & Managing Partner Andrew Koehler Managing Director, CFO, & CCO Darren Lindamood Managing Director & General Counsel Richard Wynne Managing Director Noah Hutchinson Senior Associate Cody langford Associate Mandy Roberts Controller Julia Blevins Assistant Controller Cyndhia Lasso Executive Office Administrator Natalie Duran Administrative Assistant William McMullen Founder & Managing Partner As the Firm’s Founder and Managing Partner, Mr. McMullen leads the Firm’s Investment Committee and is currently Chairman of the Board of Directors for White Knight Production and all partnerships with Mach Resources. Prior to founding BCE in 2015, Mr. McMullen served in various investment team and banker capacities at White Deer Energy, Denham Capital Management and UBS Investment Bank. Mr. McMullen was a co-founder and board member at the Ara Partners Group based in Houston, TX. He is an Ambassador for the Congaree Foundation and member of the Petroleum Club of Houston. He served as the inaugural Chairman for the Houston Young Professionals Endeavor, a program of the Greater Houston Partnership and as CFO and Board Member of the Young Professionals in Energy (“YPE”) organization, a non-profit group with more than 40,000 members worldwide. Mr. McMullen earned his Bachelor’s degree in Economics, with Honors, from Harvard University. Andrew Koehler Managing Director, CFO, & CCO Mr. Koehler serves as Managing Director, CFO and CCO for the Firm. As a Managing Director, Mr. Koehler is on the Firm’s Investment Committee and is currently on the Board of Directors for White Knight Production and all partnerships with Mach Resources. Mr. Koehler’s primary focus areas are portfolio management, fund administration and reporting, regulatory compliance, and new investment evaluation, structuring, and execution. Additionally, Mr. Koehler assists in fundraising, deal sourcing, and leads investment professional recruiting for the firm. Mr. Koehler joined the firm near its inception in early 2015 as Senior Associate. Prior to Bayou City, Mr. Koehler worked as an Associate and Analyst within the Energy Investment Banking group of Canaccord Genuity. While with Canaccord, Mr. Koehler worked on various capital markets and advisory transactions within the upstream and oilfield services sectors, including equity and debt private placements, public equity issuances, reverse mergers, and asset acquisitions and divestitures. Mr. Koehler graduated Summa Cum Laude from Tulane University with a B.A. in Economics and Political Science and a B.S. in Psychology and was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. Darren Lindamood Managing Director & General Counsel Mr. Lindamood serves as Managing Director and General Counsel for the Firm. As a Managing Director, Mr. Lindamood is on the Firm’s Investment Committee and is on the Board of Directors for all partnerships with Mach Resources. As General Counsel, he advises the Firm on all legal matters relating to fund and portfolio management. Prior to joining Bayou City, Mr. Lindamood was an attorney with Norton Rose Fulbright (formerly, Fulbright & Jaworski). He earned his law degree from Wake Forest University School of Law, where he served as Executive Editor of the Law Review. He graduated from Wake Forest University with a B.A. in English and was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. Richard Wynne Managing Director Mr. Wynne serves as Managing Director for the Firm. As a Managing Director, Mr. Wynne is on the Firm’s Investment Committee and is currently on the Board of Directors for White Knight Production and all partnerships with Mach Resources. Prior to joining Bayou City, Mr. Wynne worked as Director of Finance for one of ECP’s portfolio companies, Sendero Midstream. Previously, Mr. Wynne worked in the business development group for Plains All American Pipeline and as an Analyst in UBS Investment Bank’s Global Energy Group. Mr. Wynne holds an MBA from Columbia University and a BA in Political Science from Yale University. Noah hutchinson SENIOR ASSOCIATE Prior to joining Bayou City, Mr. Hutchinson was an associate in the Energy Investment Banking Group at Truist Securities in Houston, where he focused on A&D and M&A advisory work within the energy industry. Mr. Hutchinson graduated from Texas Christian University with a Bachelor of Business Administration with a finance concentration. Cody langford ASSOCIATE Prior to joining Bayou City, Mr. Langford was a Corporate Associate at Pickering Energy Partners, where he focused primarily on financial reporting, fund operations and accounting, and investor relations. Mr. Langford began his career with BDO USA, LLP, where he worked as a Senior Associate in their Valuation and Business Analytics division, with a focus on the financial services and oil and gas sectors. Mr. Langford holds a BSBA in Finance from The University of Arizona. Mandy Roberts Controller Prior to joining Bayou City, Mrs. Roberts worked as the Fund Accountant at Siltstone Capital, LLC, a private equity fund in Houston, Texas. Previous to Siltstone Capital, Mrs. Roberts worked as the Fund Accountant at White Deer Energy. Mrs. Roberts joined White Deer in 2013 after four years with Melton & Melton, LLP. At Melton & Melton, Mrs. Roberts worked as a Supervisor on audit engagements in various industries. Mrs. Roberts graduated with honors from Lamar University with a BBA in Accounting. Julia Blevins Assistant Controller Before joining Bayou City Energy, Mrs. Blevins was a Senior Auditor for two years at Whitley Penn, LLP. Over those two years, she supervised audit engagements in various industries, one of which was Bayou City. Prior to Whitley Penn, Mrs. Blevins resided in Fargo, North Dakota where she worked at Fiebiger, Swanson, West & Co., PLLP as a Staff Accountant. At FSW, she prepared individual and business tax returns and performed bookkeeping services. Mrs. Blevins graduated Summa Cum Laude from North Dakota State University with a B.S. in Accounting and is a Certified Public Accountant. Cyndhia Lasso Executive Office Administrator Prior to joining Bayou City, Ms. Lasso worked as the Manager of E&B Brewery Lofts, while serving as the Executive Assistant to the Owner and CEO of E&B Brewery Lofts and Pellerito Foods, Inc. in Detroit, MI. Ms. Lasso joined E&B Brewery Lofts in 2015 after fourteen years with PASCO Property Management. At PASCO, Ms. Lasso worked as the Accounts Receivable Administrator. While with PASCO Property Management Ms. Lasso oversaw the accounts receivable department while providing support to the property managers and condominium association members. Natalie Duran Administrative Assistant Prior to joining Bayou City Energy, Ms. Duran worked as a legal assistant at TrammellPC, a personal injury law firm in Houston, Texas. Ms. Duran graduated from Houston Community College with an Associate of Arts. oUR aPPROACH Low-risk, Yield-oriented Our Portfolio Cash flow generating, top-tier operators Growth equity capital for operators Reach out to BCE Contact Us About Our Team Our Approach Portfolio News Investor Login About Our Team Our Approach Portfolio News Investor Login About Us Portfolio Our Approach Team News Privacy Notice Terms of Use Contact Us 2229 San Felipe Street Suite 1075 Houston, TX 77019 713-400-8200 info@bayoucityenergy.com Copyright © 2025 Bayou City Energy ALL RIGHTS RESERVED | Design by Blue Atlas Scroll to Top

Club Homes for Sale Bayou Club homes for sale are some of the most luxurious homes in Pinellas County. The homes are nestled in the popular Bayou Club golf course in Largo, Fl. The centerpiece of the community is the signature designed Tom Fazio golf course. Bayou Club Estates homes have spectacular views of this amazing course, exceptional layouts, and the craftsmanship you would expect in luxury real estate. Bayou Club homes for sale include one and two-story layouts with a variety of architectural styles. The “typical” Bayou Club home for sale is a 4 bedroom 3 bath home with a little over 3,000 sq ft of living space, but plans vary widely. There are homes as big as 7,000 sq ft with 5 bedrooms and 4+ baths. Virtually all the homes have at least 3 bedrooms and 2 baths and over 2,000 sq ft of living area. Although there is a community pool to enjoy, most of the homes also have private pools with screened lanais. Read More Below... Interested in a home in Largo Florida? MLS #: TB8362417 See All Homes in Largo Fl Popular Largo Subdivisions Bardmoor Homes Bayou Club Collins Estates Del Prado Gated Communities Golf Communities Harbor Bluffs Harbor Hills Hillcrest Manor Homes by School District Imperial Point Homes Keene Park Largo Fl Expert Largo Homes Luxury Homes Orangewood Waterfront Homes More Information About Bayou Club Homes for Sale The Bayou Club is a deed-restricted community with a gated entrance for your privacy and security. Location The neighborhood is at the intersection of Largo, Seminole, and Pinellas Park just south of Brian Dairy Rd between Starkey and Belcher Rd. Bayou Club Estates is about 2 miles east of Lake Seminole, 7 miles from Indian Rocks Beach, and 10 miles from Clearwater Beach. It is about 17 miles from downtown St Pete and 20 miles from Tampa International Airport. What's Nearby Indian Rocks Beach and Indian Shores are the Gulf Beaches closest to the Bayou Club. They are about 10 miles west of the community. Walsingham Park is about 5 miles west and the south entrance to the park is on 102nd Ave N. The park offers wonderful picnic spots on Walsingham Lake, 2 dog parks, and several trails for walking or bike riding. The War Veterans Memorial Park is 7 miles southwest of the Bayou Club. Veterans Memorial Park has a memorial to our military veterans, great picnic spots, beautiful walking and biking trails, and a kayak launch out to Boca Ciega Bay and the bayou. Take in a play or concert at Ruth Eckerd Hall just 12 miles northeast of the Bayou Club. Downtown St Pete is just 17 miles away and it’s a fun to spend a day or evening having dinner or enjoying the nightlife. Lifestyle Residents love the country club atmosphere and the sense of community of living in this beautiful neighborhood. It is a great community for golf or just taking a walk, or relaxing by your pool and enjoying a golf view. Why People Live in Bayou Club Largo This is one of the nicest subdivisions in the Largo/Seminole area. The gated entranced provide a sense of security and rolling fairways and beautiful greens are the picture of tranquility. There is a real sense of community at Bayou Club Estates and the golf amenities are second to none in the area. Interested in Bayou Club or another Largo Florida home? We are here to help. Give us a call at 727-619-2799 or use our handy contact form below.
